column14: Molton Brown makes a great product & this is no exception but the scent is too weak. I mean you can barely smell this inside the bottle & it only gets weaker outside the bottle. Make this one stronger Molton Brown or charge way less.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2019
column14: My husband was given a sample of this body wash at a conference and really liked the scent so I purchased a larger size for him.  This particular smell is intoxicating!!!! No need for cologne after.  Smell isn’t too strong but strong enough to linger for a while and is amazing.  A little pricey but you only need a little bit so it will last for a long time.

column6: Not that impressed for such a "High End" soap.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
column14: The scents by Molton Brown are great definitely smell more masculine than most of the garbage in the stores. But my main issue is im looking for something that has a lasting smell. I had a previous body wash that I would get compliments on all the time usually asking "what cologne are you wearing it smells great." and i'd tell them I don't wear cologne its my body wash. Unfortunately it was discontinued and i'm hunting for a new brand.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
column14: Molton Brown is all I use for body shampoo. I was using only two scents until I came across this scent. I now have it in body wash and hand wash. Yes, it costs a lot more, but it will last a lot longer than your typical off the Pharmacy shelf brand. You need only use a small quantity.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
column14: My husband loves to soak in the tub and this scent is just right - not to feminine or masculine. It leaves his skin soft. I have ordered multiple times.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
column14: I never thought I would spend this much on soap!! The scent is out of this world and it lasts a long time. Love how they are Animal Cruelty Free and All Natural!! No skin rashes or consistent itchiness. if you use a loofa it will last a good while before you purchase another bottle.
